inclusion.criterion: Competent to comprehend, sign, and date an IEC-approved (Ethics Committee) informed consent form
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Histologically-confirmed metastatic adenocarcinoma of the colon or rectum by the investigator.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Wild Type K-RAS colorectal cancer determined by the designated Central Laboratory
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: At least 1 uni-dimensionally measurable lesion of at least > 10 mm with spiral CT per modified RECIST criteria 1.1.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Recurrence after adjuvant treatment with 5-fluorouracil/folinic acid or capecitabine +/- radiotherapy with a disease-free interval > than 6 months after its completion.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: De novo diagnosis of the disease.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group performance status of 0 or 1.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patients they have received prior systemic therapy for the treatment of metastatic colorectal carcinoma.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Prior anti-EGFr antibody therapy (eg, cetuximab) or treatment small molecule EGFr tyrosine kinase inhibitors (eg, erlotinib) or EGFR signal transduction inhibitors.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has received XRT to the neck. They have a history of basal cell carcinoma of the skin.
